mozilla.components.browser.domains

Class Domains

  • mozilla.components.browser.domains.Domains

  • public class Domains

    Contains functionality to access domain lists shipped as part of this module's assets.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Domains INSTANCE
      Contains functionality to access domain lists shipped as part of this module's assets.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> load(android.content.Context context)
      Loads the domains applicable to the app's locale, plus the domains in the 'global' list.

    • Field Detail

      • INSTANCE

        public static Domains INSTANCE

        Contains functionality to access domain lists shipped as part of this module's assets.

    • Method Detail

      • load

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> load(android.content.Context context)

        Loads the domains applicable to the app's locale, plus the domains in the 'global' list.

        Parameters:
        context - the application context
        Returns:
        list of domains
